snippet: A puzzle jammed with great entries by Tom Heilman.
abstract: A puzzle jammed with great entries by Tom Heilman.
lead_paragraph: SATURDAY’S PUZZLE — Were you as wowed by this one as I was? Mind you, I had to work for my “Wow!” This was not an easy puzzle by any means. But when I finally finished (making up for my abysmal showing yesterday), I was surprised at how many things I learned from this puzzle by Tom Heilman and how great most of the entries were.
